name: exbidh
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)), wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

comment: Formula-building rule for existential quantifier (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.)
